org.franca.core.utils

Class ModelPersistenceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.core.utils.ModelPersistenceHandler

  • public class ModelPersistenceHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class to deal with Eclipse mechanisms to load/save models.
    Author:
    FPicioroaga

      Creating an object used to save or to load a set of related models from files.

      • ModelPersistenceHandler

        public ModelPersistenceHandler(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.resource.ResourceSet newResourceSet)
        Creating an object used to save or to load a set of related models from files.
        Parameters:
        newResourceSet - the resource set to save all the loaded files/ where all the models to be saved exist
        newPrependPath - a relative path to work in

    • Method Detail

      • registerFileExtensionHandler

      • loadModel

        public org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject loadModel(org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI uri,
                                      org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI root)
        Load the model found in the fileName. Its dependencies can be loaded subsequently.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI to be loaded
        root - the root of the model (needed for loading multiple file models) This has to be an absolute, hierarchical URI.
        Returns:
        the root model

      • loadModel

        public org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject loadModel(java.lang.String filename,
                                      java.lang.String cwd)
        Deprecated. Use loadModel(URI uri, URI root) instead.
        Load the model found in the fileName. Its dependencies can be loaded subsequently.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to be loaded
        Returns:
        the root model

      • saveModel

        public boolean saveModel(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject model,
                java.lang.String filename,
                java.lang.String cwd)
        Saves a model to a file. If cross-references are used in the model, then the model must be part of a ResourceSet containing all the other referenced models.

        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to be saved
        cwd - a relative directory to save the file and its dependencies
        Returns:
        true if the model was saved

      • saveModel

        public boolean saveModel(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject model,
                java.lang.String filename,
                java.lang.String cwd,
                IImportedModelProvider importedModels)
        Saves a model to a file. If cross-references are used in the model, then the model must be part of a ResourceSet containing all the other referenced models.

        Parameters:
        filename - the name of the file to be saved
        cwd - a relative directory to save the file and its dependencies
        importedModels - an interface which provides a referenced model from its importURI string
        Returns:
        true if the model was saved
